articles.title: Neel Chaudhari
articles.contents:
Neel Chaudhari
          
          
          Home
          About
          Projects
          Resume
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Neel Chaudhari
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
             Welcome!! 
            I have gained adequate skills during Post Graduation to solve analytical problems using programming and visualization tools.Although Data Analytics gives me everything to explore data, Mathematical Statistics has taught me basics and advanced concepts which are used in every analytical problems.
             Creating an interactive plot is my strength as it becomes easy for audiences or non-programming background people to understand the analytical concepts.
             Having these skills are fruitful for me to solve the real-world analytical problem at Windsor Regional Hospital. These skills also help me to complete my projects with ease.
             In addition to these, I am teaching Statistics (basic statistics (mean, variance, correlation, covariance, etc.), advanced statistics (Distributions such as Normal distribution and t-distributions)) as well as Data Analytics (Exploratory Data Analysis, Data cleaning, Data Mining, Data Visualization using Rstudio, Python, SQL, and Tableau) at Varsity Tutor.
            
            
            
             Interest 
            - Mathematical Statistics
            - Data Analytics 
            - Data Science 
            - Data Mining and Data Visualization 
            - Reading Data Science books 
             Programming 
            - Python 
            - R 
            - SQL 
            
            
             Education 
            
            Post Graduation in Data Analytics For Business,
            2021 - 2022 
            St. Clair College, Ontario, Canada
            
            
            
            Bachelor’s degree in Mathematical Statistics,
            2017 - 2020 
            Gujarat University, Gujarat, India
            
            
             Experience 
            
            Data Analytics Intern at Windsor Regional Hospital, 2022 - present
            Windsor Regional Hospital, Ontario, Canada
            
            
            
            Tutor(Statistics and Data Analytics) at Varsity, 2022 - present
            Ontario, Canada
            
            
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Neel Chaudhari
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                       GitHub
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       LinkedIn
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                       Email
